name: SH4DE
description:
A short turn-based strategy game where the world moves with you. Made in PICO 8 by Abhi Sundu

Controls (Explained in-game)

  • Arrow keys to move
  • A to skip your turn and wait.
  • Z to prepare warp. Once laser is prepared, press an arrow key to warp OR press Z again to cancel
  • X to prepare laser. Once laser is prepared, press an arrow key to fire OR press X again to cancel
